system.requirements:
Tier 3; WS 40, BS 40, Wep. Training (Any Two)
Aptitudes; Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Unaligned
system.effect: When using a Non-Exotic weapon that the character is not trained in, suffer -10 penalty rather than -20.

description.value: When using a Non-Exotic weapon that the character is not trained in, suffer -10 penalty rather than -20.
